header.title: Outsourcing — qualification criterias
header.subtitle: The requirements for participating in the competition

section.title: Introduction
section.p: The qualification criterias set the minimum requirements for any company to participate in the public tender. Failure of meeting these requirements automatically disqualifies any company from the competition.
The qualification criterias are decided upon by the project board.

section.title: Qualification criterias
section.p: The following criterias will be used in selecting the vendor(s) for contract work:

ol.li: Technical ability to handle the Sámi languages. This boils down to the ability to work with Unicode data (older, 8-bit character sets for Sámi are not supported by this project).

Technical capability of handling the linguistic phenomenas of the Sámi languages:
«free» compounding
complex inflectional and derivational morphology
complex morphophonology involving consonant gradation, vowel simplification and stem alternations as part of inflection, derivation and compounding
Documented experience with the integration work specfied in the main tender document
In the case of proofing tools for MS Office: documented existing and forthgoing relationship with Microsoft, proofing tools division.
